SequenceManager._comment: the property IsParallel on two neighbouring steps is used to indicate that the steps are kicked of in parallel. The property IsSynchronous is used to indicate that the step is synchronous, i.e. the orchestrator will wait for the step to finish before continuing.

Parameters.Name: axisTargetPosition1
Parameters.HooverOverInfo: Target position for the axis movement

Parameters.HooverOverInfo: Target position for the axis movement
